com.ibm.util.merge.template.content

Class Content

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.util.merge.template.content.Segment
      • com.ibm.util.merge.template.content.Content

  • public class Content
extends Segment
    Content represents a parsed string value with replace / insert features
    Author:
    Mike Storey
